title: Grants will help region’s firefighters clean their gear
description: The state has awarded $420,000 to 75 communities to buy machines that clean smoke and toxic chemicals from firefighting gear.
content: Firefighters in communities including Braintree Bridgewater Carver Duxbury Halifax Hingham Kingston Rockland Scituate and Whitman will be a little safer thanks to in grants awarded by the state to buy machines that clean smoke and toxic c chars
